nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
An ice cube partially melted into a puddle of water under a bright sun
A frying pan on a stovetop with an egg frying
Heating and cooling can be reversed: ice melts and refreezes
Cooking an egg is permanent and cannot be reversed
